column5: Where are the crappies in Cedar in August, and what depth is the best. We are bringing my 85 year old dad and he would like to get some crappie. We met you at Northern Lights resort 2years ago and think we talked about shallow weed walleye.
They go all over that time of year.around 25'.some are derper andcsome stayvshallower.need to go look for them.good electronics would be a big help.
We will probably meet up there again in august.will talk more then.
